title: Parliament to debate crisis situation
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The present situation in the country will be taken up for debate in parliament on Wednesday (6).
This debate will be held on Wednesday (6) and Thursday (7), as per a decision reached during the Party Leaders Meeting held on Tuesday (5).
The parliamentary session is scheduled to commence at 10:00 AM.
UN human rights office urges Sri Lanka to defuse tensions peacefully
NO constitutional provision to ask President to resign – Speaker
